reviewText: Carlos does a nice clean act discussing topical situations and is really funny and entertaining. I saw him live on a Princess Cruise and he will soon have his own nightly show in Las Vegas. This is his only CD and the material is older that he does now, but still great. You'll definitely be hearing more about him in the years to come.

I haven't laughed so hard in a long long time. Highly recommended!

When you get a chance, go see Carlos' live show - you will LOL all nite long.

You might ask yourself "what ever happened to comedians that said something funny instead of just shocking me?"

Carlos tells funny stories and brings you along for the ride.  He tells you stories from the point of view of a husband and father and you can relate and just laugh.  He proves that you don't need profanity to make people laugh.  If you want to have a nice family laugh then this is the DVD for you.  You can watch this DVD with anyone and not be embarassed about the topics.

BUT make no mistake, you WILL laugh.

Well its not really that different just that if you are used like to me to latin comedians using a little of profanity or strong language well Carlos might not be for you. He is funny because of all his stories and unlike many other latin comedians it isn't that fast paced as others. Yet like said in the DVD its one that you can share with the hole family and relate. I mean Mencia is not a really a family to share with the hole family but this one. If you like stronger language, then you might you want to check out Carlos Mencia or even Gabriel Iglesias.
Carlos is a very funny comedian.  This new DVD had me and my family laughing so hard, we were crying!  Good, clean entertainment.  Quite often it is very easy to relate to his "real-life" stories.
